page.title: 01N.W.Edinburgh-An Overview
page.content: The map shows that{the area is mainly {RESIDENTIAL}with most of the buildings being homes and shops. {EDUCATION}- at primary, secondary and tertiary levels.{ {EMPLOYMENT -}high level of unemployment centrally. {INDUSTRY -}gas, electronics and engineering. {HOUSING -}a wide range of both publicly and privately owned homes.{ {LANDSCAPE -}contrast housing areas with coastline of Firth of Forth. {POPULATION -}area houses people of widely different occupations, manual to professional. {RECREATION -}wide range of activities offered. {SOCIAL CONCERNS}(centrally) - are unemployment, housing and drug abuse. {TRANSPORT -}a good network of roads. An excellent public transport system.
